74169.example_1: idha modati pecca modati, katapuñño ubhay'attha modati, so modati so pamodati, disvā kammavisuddhim'attano.
74169.commentary: (DHPa) kammavisuddhin'ti dhammika-upāsako'pi attano kammavisuddhiṃ puññakammasampattiṃ disvā kālakiriyato pubbe idhaloke'pi modati, kālaṃ katvā idāni paraloke'pi atimodati'y'evā'ti.

57063.meaning_1: mere fact of wearing an outer robe; only by wearing a patchwork robe
57063.example_1: n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi. n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, acelakassa acelakamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi. n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, rajojallikassa rajojallikamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi.
57063.example_2: ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati

57062.meaning_1: wearing an outer robe; using a patchwork robe
57062.example_1: n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅghāṭikassa saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi. n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, acelakassa acelakamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi. n'āhaṃ, bhikkhave, rajojallikassa rajojallikamattena sāmaññaṃ vadāmi.
57062.example_2: ehi tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṅghāṭiko hohi, saṅghāṭikassa te sato saṅghāṭidhāraṇamattena abhijjhālussa abhijjhā pahīyissati

30747.meaning_1: female animal which has taken human form
30747.example_1: yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakassa vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā vā uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseti, aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amātugāme mātugāmasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

30746.meaning_1: animal which has taken human form
30746.example_1: marati, āpatti pārājikassa. yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ papatati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

8547.meaning_1: not a woman; not a female
8547.notes: masc in grammar, fem in meaning

12550.meaning_1: can be told; could be explained
12550.example_1: āpattipariyantā nāma āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ārocetabbo'ti.

33110.example_1: duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā duṭṭhull'āpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

33111.example_1: duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā duṭṭhull'āpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

2932.example_1: duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā aduṭṭhull'āpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

2933.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not a heavy offence
2933.example_1: duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā aduṭṭhull'āpattisaññī anupasampannassa āroceti, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.

6175.example_1: pathaviyā apathavisaññī khaṇati vā khaṇāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, dahati vā dahāpeti vā, anāpatti.

50106.meaning_1: having eaten breakfast; after taking the morning meal
50106.example_1: tassa mayhaṃ, bho gotama, pacchābhattaṃ bhuttapātarāsassa ayam'ācāro hoti, ārāmena ārāmaṃ uyyānena uyyānaṃ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi.
50106.commentary: (DNt) pāto asitabbo'ti pātarāso, so bhutto yenā'ti bhuttapātarāso.

49749.meaning_1: name of a town; modern Bharuch
49749.example_1: tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhārukacchako bhikkhu supinante purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā, assamaṇo ahaṃ, vibbhamissāmī'ti, bhārukacchaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ passitvā etam'atthaṃ ārocesi. āyasmā upāli evam'āha, anāpatti, āvuso, supin'antenā'ti.

57829.example_1: idaṃ me, bhante, bhesajjaṃ satt'āh'ātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti
57829.commentary: (VINa) satt'āh'ātikkante atikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan'ti sace'pi sāsapamattaṃ hoti sakiṃ vā aṅguliyā gahetvā jivhāya sāyanamattaṃ nissajjitabbam'eva, pācittiyañ'ca desetabbaṃ.

74135.meaning_1: having lifestyle; endowed with way of life
74135.example_1: santi loke munayo, janā vadanti ta'y'idaṃ kathaṃsu, ñāṇ'ūpapannaṃ no muniṃ vadanti, udāhu ve jīviten'ūpapannaṃ.
74135.commentary: (NIDD2) udāhu ve jīviten'ūpapannan'ti udāhu anekavividha-atiparama-dukkarakārika-lūkhajīvit'ānuyogena upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ muniṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantī'ti, udāhu ve jīviten'ūpapannaṃ. (SNPa) udāhu ve nānappakārakena lūkhajīvitasaṅkhātena jīviten'ūpapannan'ti

58079.meaning_1: who has attained the path of stream entry through faith
58079.example_1: yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme evaṃ saddahati adhimuccati, ayaṃ vuccati saddh'ānusārī, okkanto sammattaniyāmaṃ, sappurisabhūmiṃ okkanto, vītivatto puthujjanabhūmiṃ.
58079.example_2: evam'eva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū dhamm'ānusārino saddh'ānusārino, te'pi tiriyaṃ mārassa sotaṃ chetvā sotthinā pāraṃ gamissanti.
58079.family_set: epithets of stream entry; types of ariyas

77954.meaning_1: who has attained the path of stream entry though faith
77954.example_1: taṃ kiṃ maññasi, bhaddāli, api nu tvaṃ, bhaddāli, tasmiṃ samaye ubhatobhāgavimutto vā hosi paññāvimutto vā kāyasakkhi vā diṭṭhippatto vā saddhāvimutto vā dhamm'ānusārī vā saddh'ānusārī vā'ti?
77954.commentary: (MNa) dhamm'ānusārino saddh'ānusārino'ti ime dve sot'āpattimaggaṭṭhā honti… katamo ca puggalo saddh'ānusārī? yassa puggalassa sot'āpattiphala-sacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddh'indriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, saddhāvāhiṃ saddhāpubbaṅ'gamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo saddh'ānusārī. sot'āpattiphala-sacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddh'ānusārī, phale ṭhito saddhāvimutto'ti (pu. pa. 30).
77954.family_set: epithets of stream entry; types of ariyas

38228.example_1: hirīnisedho puriso, koci lokasmi vijjati, yo niddaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasām'iva.

38265.meaning_1: should be given up; to be handed over; should be relinquished (to)
38265.example_1: tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo, yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo, ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo'ti, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
38265.commentary: (KVt) nissajjitabbo'ti ayaṃ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo, im'āhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī'ti nissajjitabbo.

49253.example_1: tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ kalahakārakaṃ vivādakārakaṃ bhassakārakaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā
49253.commentary: (NIDD1a) bhaṇḍanakārakā'ti tattha tattha gantvā bhaṇḍanaṃ karontā. (KVt) bhaṇḍanakārakehī'ti kalahakārakehi.

20590.example_1: tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ kalahakārakaṃ vivādakārakaṃ bhassakārakaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā

69574.example_1: tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ kalahakārakaṃ vivādakārakaṃ bhassakārakaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā

49501.example_1: tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ kalahakārakaṃ vivādakārakaṃ bhassakārakaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā

3112.meaning_1: who lays charges; who creates legal issues; who starts lawsuits
3112.example_1: tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, bhaṇḍanakārakaṃ kalahakārakaṃ vivādakārakaṃ bhassakārakaṃ saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakaṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, tassa parikkhāraṃ nikkaḍḍhati vā nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā

10793.meaning_1: no loft; no upper room; no mezzanine floor
10793.example_1: anāpatti, avehāsakuṭiyā sīsaghaṭṭāya heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hoti, padarasañcitaṃ hoti, paṭāṇi dinnā hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

63270.meaning_1: knocking the head; bumping the head
63270.example_1: anāpatti, avehāsakuṭiyā sīsaghaṭṭāya heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hoti, padarasañcitaṃ hoti, paṭāṇi dinnā hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
63270.commentary: (VINa) vehāsakuṭi nāma majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭā'ti yā pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa sabbaheṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti

73156.meaning_2: not to be used; not to be enjoyed
73156.example_1: anāpatti, avehāsakuṭiyā sīsaghaṭṭāya heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hoti, padarasañcitaṃ hoti, paṭāṇi dinnā hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

42087.example_1: anāpatti, avehāsakuṭiyā sīsaghaṭṭāya heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hoti, padarasañcitaṃ hoti, paṭāṇi dinnā hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
42087.commentary: (VINa) padarasañcitaṃ hotī'ti yassā uparimatalaṃ dāruphalakehi vā ghanasanthataṃ hoti, sudhādiparikammakataṃ vā tatthā'pi anāpatti. (KVt) uparitalaṃ vā padarasañcitan'ti uparimatalaṃ dāruphalakehi ghanasanthataṃ.

40175.example_1: anāpatti, avehāsakuṭiyā sīsaghaṭṭāya heṭṭhā aparibhogaṃ hoti, padarasañcitaṃ hoti, paṭāṇi dinnā hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
40175.commentary: (VINa) paṭāṇi dinnā hotī'ti mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādasikhāsu āṇī dinnā hoti, yattha nisīdante'pi na nippatanti

13424.meaning_1: brick by brick; for each and every tile
13424.example_1: tato ce uttari appaharite'pi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyyā'ti iṭṭhakāya chādentassa iṭṭhak'iṭṭhakāya āpatti pācittiyassa. silāya chādentassa silāya silāya āpatti pācittiyassa.

58699.example_1: sappāṇake appāṇakasaññī tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñcati vā siñcāpeti vā, anāpatti. appāṇake sappāṇakasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appāṇake vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

7081.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not containing living beings
7081.example_1: sappāṇake appāṇakasaññī tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñcati vā siñcāpeti vā, anāpatti. appāṇake sappāṇakasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. appāṇake vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

78174.grammar: ind, adv, instr sg of pakati
78174.example_1: atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddh'ābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā coro aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṃ pakatiyā gacchantaṃ sabbathāmena gacchanto na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṃ.
78174.example_2: anāpatti pakatiyā chandā dosā mohā bhayā karontaṃ ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

46473.example_1: puggalike puggalikasaññī aññassa puggalike, āpatti dukkaṭassa. attano puggalike anāpatti.

77848.example_1: anāpatti uddharitvā gacchati, uddharāpetvā gacchati, āpucchaṃ gacchati, otāpento gacchati, kenaci palibuddhaṃ hoti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
